title: Youjuu Toshi (Wicked City)
synopsis: There is Earth, our familiar world, and then there is the Black World, a parallel dimension that very few people are aware of. For centuries, a pact between the two worlds has been observed to maintain peace, and terms must be negotiated and renewed soon to continue relative harmony.
characters: ['Makie', 'Renzaburo, Taki', 'Spider Woman', 'Co-Worker (Female)', 'Co-Worker (Male)', 'Soap Girl', 'Hotel Owner', 'Jin', 'Mayart, Giuseppe', 'Company President']
voices: ['Fujita, Toshiko', 'Yara, Yuusaku', 'Yokoo, Mari', 'Andou, Arisa', 'Ooki, Tamio', 'Totani, Kouji', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Muramatsu, Yasuo']
